alert.note: Alert for Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 23 at 3:53PM CDT until March 23 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN TILLMAN...NORTHWESTERN WICHITA AND EAST CENTRAL WILBARGER COUNTIES... At 353 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Harrold, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Grandfield, Davidson, Hollister, Loveland, Oklaunion, Harrold and Haynesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
